item.title: Celebrating more than 200 direct followers
item.description: Awakari reaches 200 users in Telegram and Fediverse.
item.content:encoded:
Direct followers are Awakari users who follow their interests in Telegram or Fediverse.

There are also much more users who use feed reader and periodically pull results and Bluesky followers.

Additionally, Awakari's source collection grows and now contains more than 10K feeds.

Stay tuned!

item.title: Public API documentation
item.description: Public API documentation for interests and reader.
item.content:encoded:
Swagger API documentation now available for interests management and results reader:

Interests API doc

Reader API doc

Everyone is welcome to give it a try!

item.title: Exposing interests to Bluesky
item.description: Public interests are now available in Bluesky.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks to bridgy-fed, all Awakari public interests are now available in Bluesky!

The handle looks like @<INTEREST_ID>.activitypub.awakari.com.ap.brid.gy.

item.title: New Source Type: Websocket
item.category: awakari updates sse wikimedia stream integration
item.content:encoded:
Awakari started to consume events from Websocket sources. The reference sources are:

wss://www.seismicportal.eu/standing_order/websocket

wss://ws-feed.exchange.coinbase.com

wss://ws.blockchain.info/inv

wss://streamer.finance.yahoo.com/

So users can track earthquakes in realtime, new blocks in blockchain, currency rates, etc. If you know an interesting public Websocket source, please share it to add!

item.title: Retention Period Change
item.description: Results retention period changes from 2 days to 1 day.
item.content:encoded: Given the increasing volume of realtime data, the results retention period decreases from 2 days to 1 days as planned earlier.

item.title: Retention Period Change
item.description: Results retention period changes from 3 days to 2 days.
item.content:encoded: Given the increasing volume of realtime data, the results retention period decreases from 3 days to 2 days. Expect a further decreasing it down to 1 day.

item.title: New Source Type: SSE
item.description: Introducing new source type: SSE (Server-Sent Events).
item.category: awakari updates sse wikimedia stream integration
item.content:encoded: Awakari now is capable to consume events from SSE sources. The reference sources are mastodon's live streams (existed before) and wikimedia recent changes stream: https://stream.wikimedia.org/v2/stream/recentchange. If you know an interesting public SSE source, please share it to add!

item.title: New Source Type
item.description: Awakari is capable now to consume email digests.
item.content:encoded: In addition to other source types (RSS/Atom feeds, ActivityPub, Telegram, SSE, etc) there's a possibility to subscribe Awakari for email digests. Feel free to submit the desired digest page for a review.

item.title: Reading Format Changes
item.description: All event attributes are now available by the link.
item.content:encoded: While reading results, it's useful to see all event attributes to fine-tune the interest matching conditions. Previously all event attributes had been included in every result. That caused results to be too long and not convenient for reading. Now all event attributes moved to a separate place available by the link in every result.

item.title: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy updated
item.description: The change refers to replacing the term "Company" with "Contributors".

item.title: Default Publishing Limit Increased
item.description: Default publishing limit is changed from 2 to 4 messages per hour.
item.content:encoded: Awakari now has more than 7.5K active sources publishing together nearly 1 message every second. Thanks to careful and scalable design it's still pretty far from saturation. Hence there's a room for additional work.

item.title: Public Interests in the Fediverse
item.description: Now everyyone can follow any public interest in the Fediverse.
item.content:encoded:
Awakari's public interests are now exposed in the Fediverse as actors publishing the matching content.

This adds the new way to follow and read in addition to following in Telegram and reading the RSS feed.

item.title: Sharing Interests
item.description: Create or follow a public interest.
item.content:encoded: Everyone now can create public interests. A public interest is visible to others. Also everyone can follow it.
